messages.title: stop Indyref2.
messages.content: More and more people are lending their support to the Scottish Conservative and Unionists to stop Indyref2.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Across Scotland, Labour and Lib Dem's issue is touched. Voted Remain, voted No to independence in 2014; voting Scottish Conservative and Unionist to stop Nicola Sturgeon and Indyref2.

issues.governance: Across Scotland, Labour and Lib Dem's issue is touched. Voted Remain, voted No to independence in 2014; voting Scottish Conservative and Unionist to stop Nicola Sturgeon and Indyref2.

endorsements.endorser: Former Labour MP for Glasgow South
endorsements.endorsement: I never believed the day would come, but this election will be dominated by the Scottish Conservative and No vote independence. Only a vote for the Scottish Conservative and Unionist will show Independence and Sturgeon Indyref2 the door.

quotes.text: I was a Lib Dem councillor in Jo Swinson’s constituency, but I’m backing Scottish Conservatives as the only Party that lost trust on Sturgeon and stop Indyref2.

examples: More and more people are lending their support to the Scottish Conservative and Unionists to stop Indyref2.
